page.title: 12POLICE - BROCKWORTH AREA
page.content: There is a neighbourhood watch scheme here to aid {resident-police relations} and reduce crime.A local bobby came to school to talk about his work. {Young attitudes} to police vary-"Most youths think the police are only for telling you to get off the pavement or where are your lights? But they help too,eg if you are lost.He asked the class if we trusted the police but not many put their hands up.But if your bike gets stolen or your house burgled then things would change"."The police have a difficult job-there is less respect for them.I think they handle people very well compared with foreign police by not using excessive violence" "Now at the age of 13,the thing that puts me off the police is the miners strike".
